document_data.mainbody:
Ryndarth Soleilon I, who was also called the Boy King, was the fourth King of the Soleilon Dynasty who ruled the city-state of Westgate.
Ryndarth I inherited the throne when his father, King Lemere II, died when he was an infant in . However, his mother, Lharida, ruled in his stead as Regent until  when she died from poisoning. Ryndarth sat upon the throne at the age of 17. He ruled until . 
Ryndarths son and heir was Ryndarth II.
